properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ADMIN_BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN_BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =?
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM ADMIN_BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO=? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN_COM_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_GRADE =?
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM ADMIN_COM_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_GRADE = ?) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN COMPANY USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO=?
